short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See all Dependabot alerts for one or more Github organizations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dependabot is a great tool, but you have to view the vulnerability alerts repository by respository. This can be problematic if you need to view all of the alerts for a given organization. This extension allows you to view all Dependabot vulnerability alerts for one or more Github organizations in a single list.
